overview:
Tobias is the co-founder of Ge.tt.

During university he and his friend, Mathias, got the idea for how to share files a lot faster - over the browser, and using no plugins. The idea was that sharing files should be easy, for everybody, and not require knowledge of how to install a program, or understand the difference between 1 kilobyte and 1 gigabyte. This idea was implemented, some competitions was won, and it got some traction. Him and his friend stopped studying and started working full-time on this project.

He started programming in high school. Nothing fancy, but just whatever popped to his mind. Liked doing programs that other people could use.

Before university he studied at a film school and worked shortly in the film industry before going back to computers.
